relationships.description: Coordinating meeting schedule and travel plans

analysis.purpose: To coordinate scheduling of a business meeting and visit to Plant, rescheduling due to Trump-related issues occupying Jeffrey Epstein's time

notable_quotes: can you delay your trip one week, . trump related issues occupying my time.
From our side we could postponed the trip ,visit the 2 works from Plant Thursday the 15th and have our meeting Friday the 16th all of us,but need an answer from Plant.
